com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class NxtDirectCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtBase
        • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.NxtDirectCommands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable

    public class NxtDirectCommands
extends LegoMindstormsNxtBase
    A component that provides a low-level interface to a LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT robot, with functions to send NXT Direct Commands.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

      • DownloadFile

        public void DownloadFile(String source,
                String destination)
        Download a file to the robot.

        See MediaUtil.determineMediaSource(com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Form, java.lang.String) for information about what a path can be.

        Parameters:
        source - the path of the file to download
        destination - the name of the file on the robot
